title: Elegant Diamond Vanki Pendant - Addigai Charm
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut White Diamonds. The gold features a lustrous
long-lasting Hyderabad Polish for enhanced shine and durability. Diamond clarity: VS-SI
features: This exquisite pendant features a Vanki-inspired design, a traditional South Indian motif symbolizing prosperity and protection. The design incorporates floral and teardrop elements, all pavé-set with sparkling diamonds for maximum brilliance. The intricate openwork design adds a touch of lightness and modern appeal. It is designed as a charm for Addigai.
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
offering a warm and luxurious contrast.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for modern celebrations like anniversaries
and formal events. Can be worn with traditional silk sarees or contemporary outfits.
description: This Diamond Vanki Pendant is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The exquisite craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds, and durable Hyderabad Polish make it a timeless piece. It's not just jewelry; it's a symbol of heritage, prosperity, and style. A versatile piece that adds a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. Great value for money.
